-DENABLE_KVM_LEGACY=ON
-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=DEBUG -DVMI_DEBUG=__VMI_DEBUG_ALL
-DENABLE_ADDRESS_CACHE=OFF -DENABLE_PAGE_CACHE=OFF
-DENABLE_XENSTORE=OFF
-DENABLE_CONFIGFILE=OFF -DBUILD_EXAMPLES=OFF
-DREKALL_PROFILES=OFF -DBUILD_EXAMPLES=OFF
-DVOLATILITY_IST=OFF -DBUILD_EXAMPLES=OFF
-DENABLE_SAFETY_CHECKS=OFF
-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELEASE
-DENABLE_KVM=OFF -DENABLE_BAREFLANK=OFF -DENABLE_FILE=OFF
-DENABLE_XEN=OFF -DENABLE_BAREFLANK=OFF -DENABLE_FILE=OFF
-DENABLE_KVM=OFF -DENABLE_XEN=OFF -DENABLE_FILE=OFF
-DENABLE_KVM=OFF -DENABLE_BAREFLANK=OFF -DENABLE_XEN=OFF
